name: Afternoon Scuba Trip
description: Maybe you've got a morning dive planned, but want to dive in the afternoon too, or you have another tour or excursion in the morning, but would like to get in a dive that day too?  Maybe you just like to sleep in late on your vacation, but want to go scuba diving?  Maybe you want to do a night dive, but would like to see something in the daylight as well that day?  It's for you that we offer our 1-tank afternoon scuba dive.
